title: Call of Blood
description: A New Adult Vampire Romance Book Two in the bestselling vampire series, The Unnatural Brethren!   Four hundred years have passed since Ivan Lockhart’s descent into Darkness. With a voracious hunger for life, he’s set up his lair in Belvedere Island and thrives in the twenty-first century as an anonymous mogul and philanthropist. But his life hits a roadblock when his fledgling Phillip Blackwell appears out of the blue one evening with disconcerting news. Imprisoned in a remote island, Alisa Lockhart relives the past and her misfortunes. Old quarrels are laid to rest as the rise of a new threat for vampires and humans realigns Lockhart’s path with the Deveraux witches.
author: Silvana G. Sánchez
